title: Fix blank draft tab display issue

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix the issue causing the draft tab to display a completely blank white page instead of showing the application content

quotes: Draft build kari aapjo je atki gyo che

acceptanceCriteria: The draft tab loads and displays the complete landing page with all sections visible
All components (navigation, hero section, services, booking form, footer) render correctly
No console errors preventing page load
All three language options (Gujarati, Hindi, English) work properly

requirements.text: Verify all React components are properly exported and imported in the component tree
acceptanceCriteria: LandingPage component successfully renders all child sections
No missing component imports causing render failures
App.tsx correctly mounts the root component

requirements.text: Ensure all required assets (fonts, images, audio files) are properly loaded and accessible
acceptanceCriteria: Google Fonts for Gujarati/Hindi load successfully
Background images in hero section render correctly
Icon sound effects file loads without errors
All Font Awesome icons display properly

requirements.text: Validate that all styling and Tailwind CSS classes are correctly applied and not causing layout issues
acceptanceCriteria: Responsive grid layouts function on different screen sizes
No CSS conflicts causing invisible content

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file as it is not related to the frontend display issue
Preserve all existing functionality including multi-language support, animations, and SEO optimization
Maintain the current glassmorphism design aesthetic and color scheme
nonGoals: Adding new features or sections to the website
Changing the visual design or color scheme
Modifying SEO keywords or meta tags
Adding new languages beyond the existing three
